mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MGR_FUND (FUND_CATEGORY, FUND_TITLE ,FUND_CONTENTS, FUND_STARTDATE, FUND_ENDDATE, FUND_NEEDPOINT) VALUES ( #{fundCategory}, #{fundTitle}, #{fundContents}, #{fundStartDate}, #{fundEndDate}, #{fundNeedpoint} )
mapper.select: SELECT FUND_NUM, FUND_CATEGORY, FUND_TITLE, FUND_CONTENTS, FUND_STARTDATE, FUND_ENDDATE, FUND_NEEDPOINT FROM MGR_FUND ORDER BY FUND_NUM DESC
SELECT FUND_NUM, FUND_CATEGORY, FUND_TITLE, FUND_CONTENTS, FUND_STARTDATE, FUND_ENDDATE, FUND_NEEDPOINT FROM MGR_FUND WHERE FUND_NUM = #{fundNum}
